channel.title: Networking on Headtilt
channel.description: Recent content in Networking on Headtilt

item.title: Year 7-8 Networking Concepts Mk 2
item.description: Back in 2017 when I was first thinking about how I could use physical computing like Micro:bits in my classroom, I wrote some quick and nasty programs to demonstrate networking concepts like attenuation and latency in wireless connections as well as adapting some ideas from the Networking With the micro:bit book, and using basic wired networks for Morse Code (the linked site is not the original project I used the idea from, but there are only so many permutations).
